title: In which we up our video game
author: VD
content_html: The War in Paris, like everything else these days, ultimately comes down to Globos vs Logos. Okay, we will probably want to tone down the lights a little. At my age, being obscured by shadow is not necessarily a bad thing. Now that we have some idea what we’re doing, we can continue to tweak the details.
content_text:
The War in Paris, like everything else these days, ultimately comes down
to Globos vs Logos
. Okay, we will probably want to tone down the lights a little. At my age, being obscured by shadow is not necessarily a bad thing. Now that we have some idea what we’re doing, we can continue to tweak the details.
